text:
*
December 13, 1955
Mr. Bernard Buck
Station WNYC
Municipal Building
New York 7, New York
Dear Bernie:
Are you back on the ground again? Anyway, you’ll get this sometime
when the clouds dispel. Our Chicago meeting was pretty successful, I
think, and I’ll send you complete records of it within a few weeks.
Meantime, perhaps you cen help us. You wrote me originally about
the possibility of some Shakespeare from Antioch College and I talked
to the comnittee about this. I have seen five antioch productions while
summering at Ohio State, and can vouch for their merit. But somehow the
material on it at National Headquarters of the NAEB, if indeed they ever
had any, has been lost. Could you tell us how to get more, or send
same to me if you happen to have anything? Perhaps there never was any**
thing, but I get the impression that some sort of proposal has been
received and lost. 'Ye’d like to look into it further for next summer,
so need to get started at once.
Good holidays to you.
Sincerely,
KDWj ss
Kenneth D. Wright
Director of Broadcasting
